author: Special Correspondent
text:
The DMDK on Thursday invited applications from members wishing to contest the upcoming Assembly election.

In a statement, party president Vijayakant said the forms could be received from the DMDK headquarters from February 5 on the payment of Rs.10,000 for general constituencies and Rs.5,000 for reserved constituencies. The applications have to be submitted by February 14.
title: DMDK invites applications
